snippet.title: The Six Dragons Gameplay (Pre-Alpha)
snippet.description:
Epic fights in the land of Nemebrus. Gameplay footage from the pre-alpha phase of the development. Currently in closed alpha.

About the game: 
The Six Dragons is the first Open-World RPG powered by Blockchain Technology. Discover 64km2 of Open-World full of surprises, craft epic items that you truly own and participate in a player-owned, decentralized economy with real-world value.

Discord: https://discord.gg/fZeqMfr
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/749950/The_Six_Dragons/
Medium: https://medium.com/the-six-dragons
Telegram: https://t.me/thesixdragons 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/thesixdragons

Disclaimer: The game is still in development and the video not representative of the final game edition.
